text.0_Chapter: Kitzur Sefer Haredim of Rabbi Elazar Azcari- The shortened journey in  the hand "Human Life" is a positive Mitzvah from the Torah which is dependent on the heart and a negative Mitzvah deriving from the Rabbis. Depending on the heart is a
